name: gigabait/laravel-sso
description: Laravel library for implementing SSO authorizations

name: gigabait/laravel-sso
description: Laravel library for implementing SSO authorizations

post-install-cmd: php -r "$configFile = 'config/app.php'; $config = require_once $configFile; $provider = 'Gigabait\\Sso\\SsoServiceProvider'; if (!in_array($provider, $config['providers'])) { array_push($config['providers'], $provider); $configContent = '<?php\nreturn ' . var_export($config, true) . ';'; file_put_contents($configFile, $configContent); }"
post-update-cmd: php -r "$configFile = 'config/app.php'; $config = require_once $configFile; $provider = 'Gigabait\\Sso\\SsoServiceProvider'; if (!in_array($provider, $config['providers'])) { array_push($config['providers'], $provider); $configContent = '<?php\nreturn ' . var_export($config, true) . ';'; file_put_contents($configFile, $configContent); }"
